about_the_game:
This DLC adds light erotic content to the main game, which contains several scenes and dialogue for audiences over the age of 18.

Changes made

The DLC is not a dating or sex simulator, it embellishes and, in some cases, clarifies the existing story with erotic scenes and accompanying dialogue. These changes are made in the following chapters:
  • Soldiers of Sand (Peacekeepers Bunker)
  • The Room for Me and My Death
  • Top floor mystery (1st and 2nd floors) 3 scenes
  • The Tao of Microcredit (Kim's Lair) How Kim was killed
  • The Tao of Microcredit (Labyrinth) 3 Scenes
  • Nets of Sansara (Prison) 2 options

Using

Upgrade the main game to version 1.2.0 or higher and assign Actors / Nudity --> Mature in the settings. Also keep an eye on the dialogues and choose the appropriate options.

Warning

All actors are over 18 years old. Content is intended for an audience over the age of 18 only.

Important

If you do not have access to this DLC, check your account settings. If this does not help either, please contact Steam Technical Support. DLC is published the same way in all regions, and the rest is out of our hands.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains sexually explicit scenes, explicit sexual dialogues, and nudity in a mildly erotic style. All characters are 18+.

name: LEMURIA - Mature DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560 Ti or similar in characteristics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Settings: Good
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or similar in characteristics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended.

short_description: This DLC adds light erotic content to the main game, which contains several scenes and dialogue for audiences over the age of 18.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Finnish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
